dcterms:creator: M. Pahar
M. Klopper
R. Warren
T. Niesler
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 6000 continuous cough recordings and 11393 non-cough events such as laughter, doors opening and objects moving. It was collected at TASK, a TB research centre near Cape Town, South Africa from patients undergoing TB treatment.
dcterms:title: TASK dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Pahar
M. Klopper
R. Warren
T. Niesler
dcterms:description: This dataset was collected in South Africa as part of COVID-19 research and contains coughs from 18 COVID-19 positive subjects.
dcterms:title: Sarcos dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Botha
G. Theron
R. Warren
M. Klopper
K. Dheda
P. Van Helden
T. Niesler
dcterms:description: Cough audio was compiled from 17 TB and 21 healthy subjects to discriminate TB from healthy cough for developing a TB cough audio classifier.
dcterms:title: Brooklyn dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Pahar
M. Klopper
R. Warren
T. Niesler
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 402 coughs from 16 TB patients, collected to extend the previous TB cough audio classification study to discriminate TB coughs from other sick coughs in a real-world noisy environment.
dcterms:title: Wallacedene dataset

dcterms:creator: N. Sharma
P. Krishnan
R. Kumar
S. Ramoji
S. R. Chetupalli
N. R.
P. K. Ghosh
S. Ganapathy
dcterms:description: This publicly available dataset is compiled to develop machine learning algorithms for the diagnosis of COVID-19 in vocal audio, including coughs from participants around the globe.
dcterms:title: Coswara dataset

dcterms:creator: B. W. Schuller
A. Batliner
C. Bergler
C. Mascolo
J. Han
I. Lefter
H. Kaya
S. Amiriparian
A. Baird
L. Stappen
S. Ottl
M. Gerczuk
P. Tzirakis
C. Brown
J. Chauhan
A. Grammenos
A. Hasthanasombat
D. Spathis
T. Xia
P. Cicuta
M. R. Leon
J. J. Zwerts
J. Treep
C. Kaandorp
dcterms:description: This dataset was presented in the 2021 Interspeech Computational Paralinguistics Challenge and contains cough audio from COVID-19 positives and healthy subjects.
dcterms:title: ComParE dataset

dcterms:creator: J. F. Gemmeke
D. P. Ellis
D. Freedman
A. Jansen
W. Lawrence
R. C. Moore
M. Plakal
M. Ritter
dcterms:description: The Google Audio Set has manually-labelled excerpts from 1.8 million Youtube videos belonging to 632 audio event categories, and the Freesound audio database contains tagged audio with various noise levels.
dcterms:title: Google Audio Set & Freesound

dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: The LibriSpeech corpus is freely available and contains very little noise, selected utterances from 28 female and 28 male speakers.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech
